blacktie.title: BlackTie Event
blacktie.description: A networking event where attendees got the opportunity to network with industry professionals and hearing inspiring speeches from guest speakers.

youatucal.title: You at Ucalgary Event
youatucal.description: An event to welcome incoming University of Calgary students and introduce them to HerAI to inspire students to join our club and help our initiative.

hertechconnect.title: HerTech Connect
hertechconnect.description: An event catered to women in tech who are looking to network, learn more about the tech industry, and transform their lives.
